modName: Blade Of Woe Retexture by Thinch
summary: Bloodified and beautified Blade of Woe retexture.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first retexture ever. I never liked how the Blade of Woe looked so I made a few changes. Hope you\'ll all will like it. Post comments and tips as it\'s mt first and I haven\'t done anything like this before ^_^

Changes:

Handle color changed to red
Bloodified the blade
Tribal elements on the blade
A few other minor tweaks

Installation: put the textures folder in your data folder
Uninstallation: remove folder bladeofwoe from data/textures/weapons
author: Thinch
